languages.text: "Особенно учитывая, какой вспыльчивый рубака господин Каллигос Винтерскейл, и каких твердолобых дубов он сажает губернаторами на своих планетах", {n}— Абеляр морщится.{/n}

"Especially true given Calligos Winterscale's penchant for attacking first and asking questions later, and the kind of thick-skulled thugs he usually installs as governors on his planets," {n}rumbles Abelard, frowning.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Особенно учитывая, какой вспыльчивый рубака господин Каллигос Винтерскейл, и каких твердолобых дубов он сажает губернаторами на своих планетах", {n}— Абеляр морщится.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Especially true given Calligos Winterscale's penchant for attacking first and asking questions later, and the kind of thick-skulled thugs he usually installs as governors on his planets," {n}rumbles Abelard, frowning.{/n}

"Especially true given Calligos Winterscale's penchant for attacking first and asking questions later, and the kind of thick-skulled thugs he usually installs as governors on his planets," {n}rumbles Abelard, frowning.{/n}

"Especially true given Calligos Winterscale's penchant for attacking first and asking questions later, and the kind of thick-skulled thugs he usually installs as governors on his planets," {n}rumbles Abelard, frowning.{/n}

"Especially true given Calligos Winterscale's penchant for attacking first and asking questions later, and the kind of thick-skulled thugs he usually installs as governors on his planets," {n}rumbles Abelard, frowning.{/n}

languages.text: “尤其还得考虑，卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔这个人喜欢先动手，再问话。而且，他通常会委任那些心黑手辣的狠角色来当他麾下行星的总督。”{n}阿贝拉德皱着眉头说道。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Especially true given Calligos Winterscale's penchant for attacking first and asking questions later, and the kind of thick-skulled thugs he usually installs as governors on his planets," {n}rumbles Abelard, frowning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “尤其还得考虑，卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔这个人喜欢先动手，再问话。而且，他通常会委任那些心黑手辣的狠角色来当他麾下行星的总督。”{n}阿贝拉德皱着眉头说道。{/n}

languages.text: 「カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの、先に攻撃して質問は後回しにする傾向や、彼が己の惑星の統治者に悪党を据えるような厚顔無恥であることを踏まえれば、本当だと言えるでしょう」{n}アベラードが顔をしかめながら言った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Especially true given Calligos Winterscale's penchant for attacking first and asking questions later, and the kind of thick-skulled thugs he usually installs as governors on his planets," {n}rumbles Abelard, frowning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの、先に攻撃して質問は後回しにする傾向や、彼が己の惑星の統治者に悪党を据えるような厚顔無恥であることを踏まえれば、本当だと言えるでしょう」{n}アベラードが顔をしかめながら言った。{/n}

languages.text: "Das gilt umso mehr, weil Calligos Winterzunder dafür bekannt ist, erst anzugreifen und dann Fragen zu stellen. Genau wie die beschränkten Strolche, die er üblicherweise als Gouverneure auf seinen Planeten installiert", {n}brummt Abelard und verzieht das Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Especially true given Calligos Winterscale's penchant for attacking first and asking questions later, and the kind of thick-skulled thugs he usually installs as governors on his planets," {n}rumbles Abelard, frowning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das gilt umso mehr, weil Calligos Winterzunder dafür bekannt ist, erst anzugreifen und dann Fragen zu stellen. Genau wie die beschränkten Strolche, die er üblicherweise als Gouverneure auf seinen Planeten installiert", {n}brummt Abelard und verzieht das Gesicht.{/n}

languages.text: « D'autant plus lorsque l'on sait que Calligos Winterscale a une fâcheuse tendance à attaquer d'abord et poser des questions ensuite, et qu'il place souvent des brutes épaisses en guise de gouverneurs sur ses planètes, » {n}grommelle Abélard en fronçant les sourcils.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Especially true given Calligos Winterscale's penchant for attacking first and asking questions later, and the kind of thick-skulled thugs he usually installs as governors on his planets," {n}rumbles Abelard, frowning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « D'autant plus lorsque l'on sait que Calligos Winterscale a une fâcheuse tendance à attaquer d'abord et poser des questions ensuite, et qu'il place souvent des brutes épaisses en guise de gouverneurs sur ses planètes, » {n}grommelle Abélard en fronçant les sourcils.{/n}

languages.text: «Especialmente dada la costumbre de Calligos Winterscale de atacar primero y preguntar después, y los matones estúpidos a los que suele instaurar como gobernadores en sus planetas», {n}farfulla Abelard con el ceño fruncido.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Especially true given Calligos Winterscale's penchant for attacking first and asking questions later, and the kind of thick-skulled thugs he usually installs as governors on his planets," {n}rumbles Abelard, frowning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Especialmente dada la costumbre de Calligos Winterscale de atacar primero y preguntar después, y los matones estúpidos a los que suele instaurar como gobernadores en sus planetas», {n}farfulla Abelard con el ceño fruncido.{/n}

languages.text: "Calligos Winterscale'in önce saldırıp sonra soru sormaya meyilli oluşu ve genellikle gezegenlerine vali diye atadığı kalın kafalı haydutlar göz önüne alındığında, fazlasıyla doğru bir yaklaşım." {n}Abelard, kaşları çatık hâlde mırıldanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Especially true given Calligos Winterscale's penchant for attacking first and asking questions later, and the kind of thick-skulled thugs he usually installs as governors on his planets," {n}rumbles Abelard, frowning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Calligos Winterscale'in önce saldırıp sonra soru sormaya meyilli oluşu ve genellikle gezegenlerine vali diye atadığı kalın kafalı haydutlar göz önüne alındığında, fazlasıyla doğru bir yaklaşım," {n}diye mırıldanıyor kaşları çatık Abelard.{/n}
